verses.verse: And the <S%H2130>Ziphites<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Doth <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> hide <S%H5641>himself<s%> in the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H2444>Hachilah,<s%> which is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3452>Jeshimon?<s%>

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H2128>Ziph,<s%> having <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H2128>Ziph.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H2444>Hachilah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3452>Jeshimon,<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H1870>way.<s%> But <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and he <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him into the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>
David <S%H1732><s%> therefore sent <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H7270>spies,<s%> and <S%H3045>understood<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413><s%> very <S%H3559>deed.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H2583>pitched:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7200>beheld<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7901>lay,<s%> and <S%H74>Abner<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner,<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of his <S%H6635>host:<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> in the <S%H4570>trench,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2583>pitched<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> him.

Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H52>Abishai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> to <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> will go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4264>camp?<s%> And <S%H52>Abishai<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.

So <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H52>Abishai<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> by <S%H3915>night:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H3463>sleeping<s%> within the <S%H4570>trench,<s%> and his <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H4600>stuck<s%> in the <S%H776>ground<s%> at his <S%H4763>bolster:<s%> but <S%H74>Abner<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> him.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H52>Abishai<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5462>delivered<s%> <S%H853><s%> thine <S%H341>enemy<s%> into thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> this <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore let me <S%H5221>smite<s%> him, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> with the <S%H2595>spear<s%> even to the <S%H776>earth<s%> at <S%H259>once,<s%> <S%H6471><s%> and I will <S%H3808>not<s%> smite him the second <S%H8138>time.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H52>Abishai,<s%> <S%H7843>Destroy<s%> him <S%H408>not:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can stretch <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H4899>anointed,<s%> and be <S%H5352>guiltless?<s%>

David <S%H1732><s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3588>furthermore,<s%> <S%H518><s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5062>smite<s%> him; <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H4191>die;<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> he shall <S%H3381>descend<s%> into <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and <S%H5595>perish.<s%>

The <S%H4480>LORD<s%> <S%H3068><s%> <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that I should stretch <S%H4480>forth<s%> <S%H7971><s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H4899>anointed:<s%> but, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> thou <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is at his <S%H4763>bolster,<s%> and the <S%H6835>cruse<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> and let us <S%H1980>go.<s%>

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> and the <S%H6835>cruse<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> from <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H4763>bolster;<s%> and they got them <S%H1980>away,<s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> man <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, <S%H369>nor<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> it, <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H6974>awaked:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they were <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3463>asleep;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> a deep <S%H8639>sleep<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them.

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H5674>over<s%> to the other <S%H5676>side,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of a <S%H2022>hill<s%> afar <S%H4480>off;<s%> <S%H7350><s%> a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4725>space<s%> being <S%H996>between<s%> them:

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H74>Abner<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6030>Answerest<s%> thou <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H74>Abner?<s%> Then <S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> art <S%H859>thou<s%> that <S%H7121>criest<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king?<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H74>Abner,<s%> Art <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> a valiant <S%H376>man?<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> is like to <S%H3644>thee<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> then hast thou <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H413><s%> thy <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> in to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> thy <S%H113>lord.<s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou hast <S%H6213>done.<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> are <S%H1121>worthy<s%> to <S%H4194>die,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> ye have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> <S%H5921><s%> your <S%H113>master,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H4899>anointed.<s%> And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H335>where<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H2595>spear<s%> is, and the <S%H6835>cruse<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was at his <S%H4763>bolster.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H5234>knew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Is <S%H2088>this<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice,<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1732>David?<s%> And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> It is my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> O <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> doth my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H2088>thus<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> his <S%H5650>servant?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> have I <S%H6213>done?<s%> or <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> is in mine <S%H3027>hand?<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> let my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant.<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have stirred thee <S%H5496>up<s%> against me, let him <S%H7306>accept<s%> an <S%H4503>offering:<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> they be the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> <S%H779>cursed<s%> be <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they have driven me <S%H1644>out<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H4480>abiding<s%> <S%H5596><s%> in the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, let <S%H408>not<s%> my <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H5048><s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is come <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H6550>flea,<s%> as <S%H834>when<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> doth <S%H7291>hunt<s%> a <S%H7124>partridge<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> I have <S%H2398>sinned:<s%> <S%H7725>return,<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1732>David:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> do thee <S%H7489>harm,<s%> <S%H8478>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> was <S%H3365>precious<s%> in thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have played the <S%H5528>fool,<s%> and have <S%H7686>erred<s%> <S%H7235>exceedingly.<s%> <S%H3966><s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H2595>spear!<s%> and let <S%H259>one<s%> of the young <S%H4480>men<s%> <S%H5288><s%> come <S%H5674>over<s%> and <S%H3947>fetch<s%> it.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7725>render<s%> to every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and his <S%H530>faithfulness:<s%> <S%H834>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> thee into my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> but I <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> stretch <S%H7971>forth<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> thy <S%H5315>life<s%> was much <S%H1431>set<s%> by <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> in mine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> let my <S%H5315>life<s%> be much <S%H1431>set<s%> by in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and let him <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H6869>tribulation.<s%>

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H859>thou,<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1732>David:<s%> thou shalt <S%H1571>both<s%> do <S%H6213>great<s%> <S%H6213><s%> things, and <S%H1571>also<s%> shalt still <S%H3201>prevail.<s%> <S%H3201><s%> So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> on his <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his <S%H4725>place.<s%>
